H0.text: Who created the Star Wars series of films. Steven Spielberg

H1.text: Who created the Star Wars series of films. James Cameron

H2.text: Who created the Star Wars series of films. Ridley Scott

H3.text: Who created the Star Wars series of films. G lucas

A4.text: George Walton Lucas Jr. ... created the Star Wars and Indiana Jones franchises ...

A5.text: Star Wars is an American epic space opera media franchise created by George Lucas.

A6.text: In 1971, George Lucas wanted to film an adaptation of the Flash Gordon serial, but could not obtain the rights, so he began developing his own space opera.
